name: Shiplyst, Inc.
description: Operator of a managed ocean freight procurement marketplace intended to let people search and compare ocean freight rates from various shipping lines. The company's platform offers transparent and real-time tracking, data security through industrial-grade encryption, global marketplace to choose freight forwarders of choice, enabling clients to receive end-to-end container shipment service at reduced costs, thereby increasing efficiency.
one_liner: Operator of a managed ocean freight procurement marketplace intended to let people search and compare ocean freight rates from various shipping lines. The company's platform offers transparent and real-time tracking, data security through industrial-grade encryption, global marketplace to choose freight forwarders of choice, enabling clients to receive end-to-end container shipment service at reduced costs, thereby increasing efficiency.
